dict.string:
On Friday night you are invited to an awesome after-party at the Délirium Café.

The Délirium is known for its long beer list, standing at 2,004 different brands in January 2004 as recorded in the The Guinness Book of Records.

The bar is located in the small alley called Impasse de la Fidélité, only a couple of hundred metres from the Grand-Place. Don't miss the Jeanneke Pis statue nearby!
